mapper.insert:
insert into sale_contract_attachment (contract_business_id, file_name, file_url, status, create_id, creator, create_time,modify_id,modifier,modify_time) values
( #{item.contractBusinessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
